snippet.title: INFERNO CLIMBER: REBORN　 Promotion Video
snippet.description:
INFERNO CLIMBER is a survival action game that was released on Steam in 2016, and we're re-releasing it at a new price for PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, and in the Microsoft Store.
We're uploading a new trailer for INFERNO CLIMBER: REBORN on 3/28.

Our hero must sign a contract with death in order to traverse a hellish landscape to collect the 5 purgatory stones held by 5 different countries. Combine these stones and return the world as it once was in this survival action RPG!

Check out our homepage:
http://www.arcsystemworks.jp/InfernoClimberReborn/

© ARC SYSTEM WORKS
